mapper.insert: insert into user( Id, OPENID, NICKNAME, SEX, BIRTH, CITY, EDUCTATION, INCOME, ISMARRY, HASCHILD, WANTCHILD, WORK, CAR, HOUSE, WEIGHT, BODYSIZE, SMOKE, DRINK, CONSTELLATION, ETHNIC, MARRYTIME, SHOWINFO, HEIGHT, TEXT, ISADMIN ) values ( UUID(), #{openid}, #{nickname}, #{sex}, #{birth}, #{city}, #{education}, #{income}, #{ismarry}, #{haschild}, #{wantchild}, #{work}, #{car}, #{house}, #{weight}, #{bodysize}, #{smoke}, #{drink}, #{constellation}, #{ethnic}, #{marrytime}, #{showinfo}, #{height}, #{text}, #{isadmin} )
mapper.update: update user set openid = #{openid}, nickname = #{nickname}, sex = #{sex}, birth = #{birth}, city = #{{city}, education = #{education}, income = #{income}, ismarry = #{ismarry}, haschild = #{haschild}, wantchild = #{wantchild}, work = #{work}, car = #{car}, house = #{house}, weight = #{weight}, bodysize = #{bodysize}, smoke = #{smoke}, drink = #{drink}, constellation = #{constellation}, ethnic = #{ethnic}, marrytime = #{marrytime}, showinfo = #{showinfo}, height = #{height}, text = #{text} where id = #{id}
